parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (CMF 11240015), which is a strong indicator of electoral propaganda, as it's a mandatory identifier for campaign materials.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions "Elena Lasconi" and promotes her candidacy for President, along with the USR party.  This directly refers to a specific candidate participating in the elections, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, this message is clearly intended to reach a wide audience, not just a select few. The use of hashtags further amplifies its public reach, satisfying "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters to support Elena Lasconi and the USR party. The call to action "Votează USR! Votează echipa Elena Lasconi!" explicitly aims to influence voting behavior, thus fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post lacks any journalistic elements. It doesn't present news, analysis, or opinions; instead, it directly promotes a candidate and party.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a clear and direct endorsement of a candidate and party.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>4123748011229965</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to a specific candidate (Elena Lasconi), is used during the electoral campaign period (although the exact date is not specified, the CMF number suggests it is), has a clear electoral objective (influencing votes), and is targeted at the general public via a paid Facebook advertisement. The presence of the CMF number further strengthens this conclusion.  There are no counterarguments to suggest otherwise.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>Elena Lasconi</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>USR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
USR Maramureș, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări pe Facebook cu ID-ul 4123748011229965 după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează candidatul Elena Lasconi și Partidul USR pentru alegerile parlamentare, conținând îndemnul explicit „Votează USR! Votează echipa Elena Lasconi!”,  având ca efect electoral influențarea voturilor în favoarea candidatei și partidului menționat. Prezența numărului CMF 11240015 confirmă natura de material electoral a postării, iar plata pentru promovarea acesteia pe o platformă publică precum Facebook demonstrează intenția de a ajunge la un public larg.  Postarea, prin natura sa, depășește limitele activității jurnalistice de informare a publicului.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
